channel.title: Alpha! Brand new server with webclient
channel.description:
[url=http://www.playalpha.webs.com]http://www.playalpha.webs.com[/url] [url=http://www.playalpha.webs.com]http://www.playalpha.webs.com[/url]
-Dad, Rock, and mountain trolls added with drops. -troll training area added. -Black dragons tele in quest tab. -::experiments added (all 3 experiments coded in a training area. Drops coins and bones). -New KQ area (not in ape atoll this time :D) -Deleted ::shops -Changed home to scaperune jail room -All shops added to new home -New home finished -Added ::meleestuff command -Reduced theiving stall cash rewards and moved theiv stalls to ::skill -Added all commands to commands interface -Fixed d claws so you dont need 60 defence to wield them; just 60 attack -::pureset (gives a good pure outfit) - beasted out the client =DDD -changed the amount of pc points given from 10 to 5 to make void an actual challenge to get -all skills work! -Working dfs -veng works in pvp combat -All barrows specials -New whip gfx -All godsword specials work 100%!!! -d claws -Spirit shields -Dagon'hai robes -Elite Black armor -Edible easter egg and pumpkin! -P ring and necklace with epic high stats! -Skillcapes and skill hoods -sara brews and super restores (3:1 brew to restore ratio as in regular Runescape) -working slayer assignments -working slayer gem -Godwars -7 wave fight caves -corp beast -kalphite queen -Mithril dragon -dagannoth kings -troll training area -experiment training area -barrows -assualt -fight pits- get barrows gloves as a reward -pest control -pvp point system with an exchange shop -duel arena -king black dragon -chaos elemental -new hitpoint bar -random event (click on a skill in an onscreen menu) -::lock and ::unlock (to lock/unlock your experience gaining)

item.title: Alpha! Brand new server with webclient
item.dc:creator: @AlphaChris AlphaChris
item.description:
@AlphaChris wrote:

http://www.playalpha.webs.com
http://www.playalpha.webs.com

-Dad, Rock, and mountain trolls added with drops.
-troll training area added.
-Black dragons tele in quest tab.
-::experiments added (all 3 experiments coded in a training area. Drops coins and bones).
-New KQ area (not in ape atoll this time :D)
-Deleted ::shops
-Changed home to scaperune jail room
-All shops added to new home
-New home finished
-Added ::meleestuff command
-Reduced theiving stall cash rewards and moved theiv stalls to ::skill
-Added all commands to commands interface
-Fixed d claws so you dont need 60 defence to wield them; just 60 attack
-::pureset (gives a good pure outfit)

  • beasted out the client =DDD
    -changed the amount of pc points given from 10 to 5 to make void an actual challenge to get
    -all skills work!
    -Working dfs
    -veng works in pvp combat
    -All barrows specials
    -New whip gfx
    -All godsword specials work 100%!!!

    -Spirit shields
